title: well begun is half done
body:
title: well begun is half done

ship: wanda maximoff × fem!reader

request: yes | no

summary: the sun is up in the sky and for that reader wakes up. On the other side of the bed there is Wanda, as much naked as her. And thing led to another.

fandom: mcu, avengers

word count: 600+

warnings: light smut, so nothing too much dirty. mind power control kink (?)


You rolled on the other side of the bed, covering your eyes with your pillow from the light that was coming through the curtains. An hand stroke you back gently, trying to wake you up. As soon as you opened your eyes a pair of soft lips touched yours. Just a simple smack. Soft and quick, kinda like an habit. You smile at the idea of this becoming something you could get used to.

You rubbed the remainders of sleep from your eyes, feeling the soft cotton of the blankets on your skin, revisiting last night events.

You shifted on the mattress, your view still blurry, to look at her. She was lying on her left side. The only sheet you had - because of the heat - was adhere on her, revealing her define curves and the shape of her nips.

“Who would think that Scarlet Witch is a first date sex-er” you teased, moving a strand of hair behind her ear. She smiled, letting out a soft giggle. Her smile was genuine and warming, making your heart malt.

It could sound cheesy, but you could stare at her for hours and never heard the clock ticking. Like one of those big scenes in the movies, where the principals just look at each other, not caring about the time moving forward or the people around them.

“To be fair, you are the one who couldn’t keep her hands to herself” she said giving you another kiss. This one was more heavy and hot and breathy, not trying to win a battle but seeking union and closeness and the sharing of one breath, one sensation, one passionate moment before get back to reality. You climbed on top of her with a fast turn of hips. Your legs along her waist and your naked entrance a few inches over her belly button.

“Can you blame me?” you said quickly “how am I supposed to resist a face like this” you said starting kissing her cheekbones. She giggled over your touch, her breath brushing your neck, creating goose bumps all over your body. 

One hand was on your thigh, the other on your waist. Both gracefully squeezing your hot flesh.

“Or this neck” you added following a long and slow wake of kisses till down her neck.

You could feel her chest rising up and down irregularly. Your boobs pressing against one another, both her hands now on your ass, not squeezing so gently anymore. Her eyes were rolled up, mouth wide open and her cheekbones even more in evidence then before.

“Or this breast” your lips were pressed on her right nip, while the other one was stimulated by your other hand. You had to stop sucking it to moan, you felt an entity against your clit. Her hand were still on you ass, and it wasn’t you for sure.

In fact it wasn’t her - well - not her hands directly.

“Amazing don’t you think” she spoke up after a moment “how can my powers tell your mind what to feel”.

Wanda was using her powers to give you pleasure. In another situation you would have hated the thought of someone in your head, but to make you cum? And it was this wonderful woman? Hell, yeah!

So you shut down your mind as you feel the first climax arrive. You just wanted to enjoy this timeless moment, where no one could have hurted you, or her.

As one old friend used to say, well begun is half done - let’s just hope she was right.

blog.description: hi! I’m Heather! I’m just a lesbian with anxiety and a habit of having conversations with myself.

summary:
Tony after the events of the first avengers is actually from the future...
In endgame when they travel back in time to the...
body:
Tony after the events of the first avengers is actually from the future…



In endgame when they travel back in time to the battle of New York, when Tony takes the bomb to space, he actually dies and the chitauri are actually sent by thanos from the future to try and stop the avengers from defeating him in the future and past tony stumbles upon this going through the worm hole and future tony takes his place in going back probably due to being forced by another avenger cause they were loosing the battle against thanos and needed someone from the future in the past so that that person could prepare for thanos therefore is why tony sees the avengers dead in age of ultron, it’s actually a memory from the future and why he tells steve “that up there, that’s the endgame” cause he knows that they’ll loose and would explain why he has so much anxiety when thinking about the battle of New York and anything to do with space!

body:
Endgame Theory???

Ok so it’s been a while since the new trailer came out and boy it was amazing!!!! well a few days ago the IMAX trailer came out and it was pretty much the same, nothing new. But one thing caught my attention, Natasha says the following “Thanos did what he said he’s gonna do, he wiped out half of the universe”, but…. how did she know that?????!!! Thanos never said it to them. He just came in and they started to fight. The only time he said those things were on Titan, while talking to Dr strange and later when he stabbed Tony…. Other than that he never mentioned it….

Now there was another scene where Gamora was explaining this to the gaurdians And Thor… and since thor and rocket are with the avengers now they might’ve spilled the beans.

Or is it that Tony’s message finally reached pepper and she showed it to the avengers and they’re getting ready to go to space????

tags: jumping on the incorrect quotes train
summary: Carol: Attention passengers this is your pilot speaking, we’re about to be experiencing some heavy turbulence shortly so please...
body:
Carol: Attention passengers this is your pilot speaking, we’re about to be experiencing some heavy turbulence shortly so please strap in. Captain America just bet that I couldn’t do a 360 barrel roll in this thing and let’s just say that I’m about to be $20 richer real soon.

Tony: *gasp* Steve you sure you want to bet that much? Back in your day that was enough money to buy 40 lbs of steak.

summary: In The Shadows of the Night
body:
In The Shadows of the Night

N/A- I had to write a thingy for school and this happened. Probably the only work of mine ever that I will edit and will end up here. Also, if you guys like it I can always turn it into a series, Avengers, spiderman or completely original.

All throughout her childhood, Sabrina had been a quiet child and had kept to herself. She didn’t make messes in primary school, she always did her homework in high school and didn’t get into fights or cause drama. All throughout her life she had kept to the shadows and hadn’t drawn any attention to herself, that was just the way it was.

Now, most teenagers will eventually grow out of their shells over time, but Sabrina never had a shell. There was just no reason for people to notice her, there was nothing special about her, she was just… Sabrina.

And that’s why she was able to do what she did.

As she walked down the hall of her university, people buzzed about how last night the mysterious Shadow had rescued a young man from a burning dorm building, none of them would ever expect that she was the vigilante in black. While she weaved through the groups of people in the halls, she smiled, she loved helping people.

-

Sabrina sat quietly on the rooftop of a nearby building, waiting and listening for her cue to intervene in any illegal activity. Besides listening to her stolen police radio, she also watched the area around her for muggings and robberies. Suddenly she heard her cue from the alleyway below her,

“Give me your money or I’ll shoot!”

She could tell from the wavering voice of the assailant that they wouldn’t be shooting anytime soon, but she knew that people aren’t always what they seem.

As she dropped noiselessly behind the man, Sabrina noted the fear in the young woman’s eyes as she clutched her small purse to her chest. She also noted the strong build of the man holding her at gunpoint, nothing she couldn’t handle, though.

“Bu-but it’s all I have…” she stuttered, backing away. Sabrina cringed, wrong move hun, your money isn’t worth your life.

Sabrina crept towards the robber, being careful to be quiet. When she got close enough, she pounced. Slipping her around him quickly, she was able to grab the gun from the startled man. After she knew that no one would be shot she was able to pressure point the man on his neck.

Once the man had crumpled to the ground she was finally able to look the young girl in the eyes. The amazement and wonder shown was the same that she had seen the night before.

The girl spoke, “You’re… aren’t you Shadow? You saved that boy last night..”

Sabrina’s lip turned up in a playful smirk, “Maybe. You should get home, and hide that money away somewhere safe.”

-

The next day there was an article in the local newspaper, written by the girl she had saved the night before, and it was titled: “Shadow- The Hero of Today.”

Sabrina smiled softly as she took a sip of her coffee, “Hero, huh? I can work with that.”

reblog.comment:

As she dropped noiselessly behind the man, Sabrina noted the fear in the young woman’s eyes as she clutched her small purse to her chest. She also noted the strong build of the man holding her at gunpoint, nothing she couldn’t handle, though.

“Bu-but it’s all I have…” she stuttered, backing away. Sabrina cringed, wrong move hun, your money isn’t worth your life.

Sabrina crept towards the robber, being careful to be quiet. When she got close enough, she pounced. Slipping her around him quickly, she was able to grab the gun from the startled man. After she knew that no one would be shot she was able to pressure point the man on his neck.

Once the man had crumpled to the ground she was finally able to look the young girl in the eyes. The amazement and wonder shown was the same that she had seen the night before.

The girl spoke, “You’re… aren’t you Shadow? You saved that boy last night..”

Sabrina’s lip turned up in a playful smirk, “Maybe. You should get home, and hide that money away somewhere safe.”

-

The next day there was an article in the local newspaper, written by the girl she had saved the night before, and it was titled: “Shadow- The Hero of Today.”

Sabrina smiled softly as she took a sip of her coffee, “Hero, huh? I can work with that.”

trail.content_raw:
In The Shadows of the Night

N/A- I had to write a thingy for school and this happened. Probably the only work of mine ever that I will edit and will end up here. Also, if you guys like it I can always turn it into a series, Avengers, spiderman or completely original.

All throughout her childhood, Sabrina had been a quiet child and had kept to herself. She didn’t make messes in primary school, she always did her homework in high school and didn’t get into fights or cause drama. All throughout her life she had kept to the shadows and hadn’t drawn any attention to herself, that was just the way it was.

Now, most teenagers will eventually grow out of their shells over time, but Sabrina never had a shell. There was just no reason for people to notice her, there was nothing special about her, she was just… Sabrina.

And that’s why she was able to do what she did.

As she walked down the hall of her university, people buzzed about how last night the mysterious Shadow had rescued a young man from a burning dorm building, none of them would ever expect that she was the vigilante in black. While she weaved through the groups of people in the halls, she smiled, she loved helping people.

-

Sabrina sat quietly on the rooftop of a nearby building, waiting and listening for her cue to intervene in any illegal activity. Besides listening to her stolen police radio, she also watched the area around her for muggings and robberies. Suddenly she heard her cue from the alleyway below her,

“Give me your money or I’ll shoot!”

She could tell from the wavering voice of the assailant that they wouldn’t be shooting anytime soon, but she knew that people aren’t always what they seem.

As she dropped noiselessly behind the man, Sabrina noted the fear in the young woman’s eyes as she clutched her small purse to her chest. She also noted the strong build of the man holding her at gunpoint, nothing she couldn’t handle, though.

“Bu-but it’s all I have…” she stuttered, backing away. Sabrina cringed, wrong move hun, your money isn’t worth your life.

Sabrina crept towards the robber, being careful to be quiet. When she got close enough, she pounced. Slipping her around him quickly, she was able to grab the gun from the startled man. After she knew that no one would be shot she was able to pressure point the man on his neck.

Once the man had crumpled to the ground she was finally able to look the young girl in the eyes. The amazement and wonder shown was the same that she had seen the night before.

The girl spoke, “You’re… aren’t you Shadow? You saved that boy last night..”

Sabrina’s lip turned up in a playful smirk, “Maybe. You should get home, and hide that money away somewhere safe.”

-

The next day there was an article in the local newspaper, written by the girl she had saved the night before, and it was titled: “Shadow- The Hero of Today.”

Sabrina smiled softly as she took a sip of her coffee, “Hero, huh? I can work with that.”

summary: This isn’t a happy story. So if your looking for happily ever after this story isn’t for you.  The Venom Verse  - Part 1: Renee...
caption:
This isn’t a happy story. So if your looking for happily ever after this story isn’t for you. 

The Venom Verse - Part 1: Renee (on Wattpad) https://my.w.tt/hOSSAYabMU There are many different dimensions of our world. Or as some call it “The Multiverse.” But one things for certain it seems no matter the dimension no matter the world. We are always meant to find each other. No matter how long it takes. No matter the pain and suffering we have to go through. We will always find one another.

summary:
Sister: I like Iron Man & The Avengers, I don't know why I haven't watched any of the others
I casually tell her about Captain...
body:
Sister: I like Iron Man & The Avengers, I don’t know why I haven’t watched any of the others

I casually tell her about Captain America & Agents of SHIELD and some of the other stuff I like, she says she’s gonna watch Black Panther when she gets home

- A few hours later -

Sister: Watched Black Panther, starting Avengers Infinity War

Me: BRO

Sister: I like Thor’s brother

Me: BRO

Sister: Wait I’m confused I should watch the other movies first

Me: delicately balancing on the precipice of overwhelming her - Yeah probably, definitely the other Avengers & Captain America movies - proceeds to explain the MCU as succinctly as possible including whats crucial vs enjoyable vs not the best use of her time

Sister: OH thats a lot

Me: cant help myself Captain Marvel comes out next week and Avengers 4 in April!

Sister: I’ll start with Avengers 2 tomorrow

Stay tuned…

title: Dessert
body:
Shameless PWP

Dessert

You had just finished dinner and you couldn’t tear your hands from each other. You even skipped dessert, an awful thing to do in your opinion. But after Loki whispered you’d be his dessert in your…
